column1: 1759|nearly six o'clock|It was nearly six o'clock in the evening
column2: and the absurd bell in the six-foot tin steeple of the church went clank-clank
column3: clank- clank! as old Mattu pulled the rope within.

column1: 1759|nearly six o'clock|When he arrived it was nearly six o'clock
column2: and the sun was setting full and warm
column3: and the red light streamed in through the window and gave more colour to the pale cheeks.
